name: Dark Jump (Alais29)
description:
My submission for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022.

A simple platform game made with UE5, and my first game ever made :) 

Given the theme of the jam (Death is only the beginning) I wanted to go for a post-apocalyptic setting where almost all humanity is dead and the character needs to escape through a portal to another dimension to save herself, but first she has to overcome some obstacles to get to it. I may add some more levels in the future :)

Controls:

  • Movement: W A S D keys
  • Camera control: Mouse
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Sprint: Left shift
  • Pause: Escape or P key

Resources used:

  • Sounds & Music -  Freesound
  • Character & animations - Mixamo
  • 3D assets - Quixel Bridge
  • Portal image - Pexels

Known Bugs:

- Sudden drop on FPS sometimes, try lowering graphic settins and limiting FPS if it happens
